contents.title: HGIA Green Loan Portal
contents.description: Leveraging and integrating existing solutions (such as Salesforce, etc.) to provide our applicants with a more intuitive, customer friendly and timely experience with government loan programs.

contents.title: ETS/HGG Community Engagement & Digital Storytelling
contents.description: Using data to better communicate a story and foster community engagement and participation in achieving the goals of the Aloha+ Dashboard.

contents.title: Energy/HECO Electric Vehicle Charging Analysis
contents.description: a dashboard displaying health of charging station shall be updated every 5-10 minutes using key metrics developed from charging data analysis. A utilization tracker shall include a “congestion” threshold at which a new station in the same location is needed. The impact from EV charging would better inform stakeholders the amount of power used during various times of day by EVs and the corresponding reductions in fossil fuel use and in GHG emissions.

contents.title: DOE Aloha+ Curricular Database
contents.description: Curricular development is often done in silos and the resources generated from that are scattered across platforms and websites. We also lack a process to certify content to standards and career pathways. If we could construct an OER that enables specialists to certify materials (cross-walked to standards and HĀ policy, aligned to pathways) that would be accessible across educational systems, we could eliminate those silos and potentially create a resource with global impact.

contents.name: Education
contents.description: Education is the process of facilitating learning, or the acquisition of knowledge, skills, values, beliefs, and habits.

contents.name: Community Engagement
contents.description: Community engagement seeks to better engage the community to achieve long-term and sustainable outcomes, processes, relationships, discourse, decision-making, or implementation.

contents.name: Sustainability
contents.description: Avoidance of the depletion of natural resources in order to maintain an ecological balance.

contents.name: Videography
contents.description: The process or art of making video films.

contents.name: User Interface Design
contents.description: The process of making interfaces in software or computerized devices with a focus on looks or style.

contents.name: Database Management
contents.description: The data storage, operations and security practices of a Database Administrator (DBA), throughout the life cycle of the data.

contents.name: Java
contents.description: Java is a general-purpose programming language that is class-based, object-oriented, and designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

contents.name: Postgres
contents.description: PostgreSQL, also known as Postgres, is a free and open-source relational database management system emphasizing extensibility and SQL compliance.

contents.name: Meteor
contents.description: Meteor, or MeteorJS, is a free and open-source isomorphic JavaScript web framework written using Node.js.
